Package com.brashmonkey.spriter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Player.PlayerListener
    A listener to listen for specific events which can occur during the runtime of a Player instance.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    Represents an animation of a Spriter SCML file.
    Box
    Represents a box, which consists of four points: top-left, top-right, bottom-left and bottom-right.
    Calculator
    A utility class which provides methods to calculate Spriter specific issues, like linear interpolation and rotation around a parent object.
    CCDResolver
    An inverse kinematics resolver implementation.
    Curve
    Represents a curve in a Spriter SCML file.
    Curve.Constraints
    Represents constraints for a curve.
    Data
    Represents all the data which necessary to animate a Spriter generated SCML file.
    Dimension
    Represents a dimension in a 2D space.
    Drawer<R>
    A Drawer is responsible for drawing a Player.
    Entity
    Represents an entity of a Spriter SCML file.
    Entity.CharacterMap
    Represents a Spriter SCML character map.
    Entity.ObjectInfo
    Represents the object info in a Spriter SCML file.
    File
    Represents a file in a Spriter SCML file.
    FileReference
    Represents a reference to a specific file.
    Folder
    Represents a folder in a Spriter SCML file.
    IKObject
    An inverse kinematics objects which defines a constraint for a IKResolver.
    IKResolver
    A IKResolver is responsible for resolving previously set constraints.
    Interpolator
    Utility class for various interpolation techniques, Spriter is using.
    Loader<R>
    A loader is responsible for loading all resources.
    Mainline
    Represents a mainline in a Spriter SCML file.
    Mainline.Key
    Represents a mainline key in a Spriter SCML file.
    Mainline.Key.BoneRef
    Represents a bone reference in a Spriter SCML file.
    Mainline.Key.ObjectRef
    Represents an object reference in a Spriter SCML file.
    Player
    A Player instance is responsible for updating an Animation properly.
    Player.Attachment
    An attachment is an abstract object which can be attached to a Player object.
    PlayerTweener
    A player tweener is responsible for tweening to Player instances.
    Point
    A utility class to keep the code short.
    Rectangle
    Represents a 2D rectangle with left, top, right and bottom bounds.
    SCMLReader
    This class parses a SCML file and creates a Data instance.
    Spriter
    A utility class for managing multiple Loader and Player instances.
    Timeline
    Represents a time line in a Spriter SCML file.
    Timeline.Key
    Represents a time line key in a Spriter SCML file.
    Timeline.Key.Bone
    Represents a bone in a Spriter SCML file.
    Timeline.Key.Object
    Represents an object in a Spriter SCML file.
    TweenedAnimation
    A tweened animation is responsible for updating itself based on two given animations.
    XmlReader
    Lightweight XML parser.
    XmlReader.Element  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Curve.Type
    Represents a curve type in a Spriter SCML file.
    Entity.ObjectType
    Represents the object types Spriter supports.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SpriterException
    An Exception which will be thrown if a Spriter specific issue happens at runtime.
